name: Open HealthCare Network

projects.summary: This project focuses on developing a diet management system within the CARE application, aiming to enhance user health monitoring and nutritional tracking.
Aiming to create tools for nutrition rehabilitation, this project supports better dietary management for users recovering from health issues.
This project aims to integrate immunization records based on FHIR standards into the CARE application, improving patient health data accessibility.
Focusing on creating personalized health record flows, this project enhances user interactions and data tracking for better patient care.

projects.project_name: Improve the Package Showing Health Information
projects.summary: This project aims to enhance the display of health information in the CARE application, making it more user-friendly and comprehensive.
Developing a WhatsApp bot for the CARE application to facilitate easier communication and health management for users.
This project will integrate risk assessment tools based on FHIR standards, aiming to improve preventive care through better health risk evaluations.
This project focuses on developing a terminology server that utilizes Google Sheets as a backend, improving data management for health records.
Creating a human resource management module for the CARE application to streamline human resources processes and staff management.
This project aims to develop a plugin that integrates Copilot functionality into the CARE application, enhancing user guidance and support.
Implementing offline capabilities for data entry in the CARE application, allowing users to input information without needing constant internet access.
Developing capabilities to support on-premises deployment of the CARE application, offering users flexibility in data management.
Aiming to integrate the Beckn protocol into the CARE application to enhance interoperability and service delivery.
This project focuses on integrating the Unified Health Interface (UHI) into the CARE system, improving data exchange and healthcare access.

projects.project_name: Enhancing Medication Notifications in CARE 3.0 for Palliative Care & Adherence
projects.summary: This project will improve medication notifications specifically for palliative care, ensuring patients adhere to their medication schedules effectively.
Implementing Single Sign-On (SSO) support in the CARE application for improved user accessibility and streamlined login processes.
